OOC: THE POINT IS THAT BEING SO CLOSE IN TO HIM AT
THIS POINT WOULD HAVE CAUSED DAMAGE! aND IF YOU DON'T
START ACCEPTING SOME I'LL CALL IN HUGAR! MUTATE WAS
FIRING AT POINT BLANK RANGE! HOW THE HECK IS HE GOING
TO DODGE THAT!

Mutate fell back. He was furious. He remembered what
the voices had said "Your destiny is not yet
fulfilled", and he doubted his destiny was to go down
in flames twice. He fired 8 shots at him. One directly
at him and 7 in a circle around him that would hit him
if he dodged the first.

OOC: YOU BETTER TAKE SOME DAMAGE NOW OR WHILE YOU'RE
MODERATED I'LL POST MUTATE RIPPING YOU'RE GUY APART
(it was a joke don't e-mail me about it)!

--- Quickstrk7@... wrote:
> OOC: Actually Radiation wouldn't cause damage to the
> robots. Nor would it 
> really amplify the powers of a stun beam.
> 
> The mysterious infecticon spun around as mutate
> attempted to fire at him, the 
> chaochitan energy within its body increasing its
> speed. A second later the 
> six small blue circles on his chest began to glow
> before launching six micro 
> fusion beams at mutate.
>
